name: 温室之城（Glass City : The Dust）
detailed_description:
ABOUT THE LANGUAGE

The English translating work is in process, I`m trying to make a professinal English version,It takes time, Please wait for a while, thank you.

STORY

Izzaig virus is a masterpiece of devil. Their extremely sturdy shell keep them from harm. They floating in the air just like dust, once they contacted with a suitable host, They madly replicate themselves, and that lead to death. In 2035, Izzaig outbroke globally, scientist could not find the cure, billions people died in this disaster. And the worse thing is that more and more germs from outspace invaded earth, people struggle for living.

The survivals have to live in buildings with gas sealing system, They can only live in a closed environment, keeping away from terrible germs. Since then, to smell a flower in nature would cost your life.

CHARACTER

Thoms is a young biochemist, his doctoral supervisor had no child, he regarded him as his own, but Izzaig took the old man`s life, he had transferred a greenhouse in Flybird city to thomas `s name before him went heaven. After that, Thomas moved there, started his research of these germs, Flybird city is the only place which has not polluted by Izzaig, people call it "Glass City". he vowed to defeat these crafts of devil. And fortunately these plants contain substances which could kill germs, except that, some substances has special effect that make them valuable, extract them from plants, sell them on the market, There are many competitors, they are smart and heartless adventurer.

FEATURES

  • Complex substances system based on chemical principle, you can extract substances from alien plants, or make by chemical reaction.use these substances you can make bullets, perfumes, fertilizers, drugs, and so on.
  • A powerful dynamic Marketing system based on economics regulation, It`s full of challenge, competing with other AI.You can sell everything you made in your greenhouse,the customers from city will buy your merchandise depend on thier reqirement and quality of them, otherwise you can be the customer too.
  • Every character in game has thier individual personality, job, health. such as a brave sodier will try his best to fight when he encounter enemy, but a craven one will run away; dozens job for AI character, you could hire them on the talent market, and manage them from internet in the game, also you can improve their ability if you want.
  • An organic dynamic city system, evey single building is interactive, you can buy the buildings, then you have the right to manage them, set multiple department to improve the renter`s quality of life and attract more renters.
  • A randomizing germs system, simulating the process of real germs infect human. If you can find the cure to some of them ,you could definitely make a fortune.

short_description: Glass City : The Dust is a distinctive sim game. Control your character, trying to survival in a glasshouse, making profit from planting, crafting, and so on. Competing with AI, and trying to make the population of city grow, keep the people from contacting deadly germs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core i3 380m
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 425M 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
